name: Truth or Dare: Game For Teens
name_original: Truth or Dare: Game For Teens
description:
Truth or Dare is a drinking game! Made by adults for adults! Ideal for house parties, groups, students, and other social events that have alcohol, beer, wine, cocktails in them.

Pass the phone around, everyone chooses if they want truth or dare. If you don’t want to answer truth to the question, drink! If you don’t want to do the dare, drink!

Or you can play without drinking, that means no backing out!

That's about it.

The challenges (truths and dares) are divided between 7 categories, if you don't want to turn your party into an intimate naked gathering then don’t use those decks.

If you want a really crazy night then remove all the normal decks.

Have fun.

Drink responsibly.
